hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #an Ice Trap#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Fire Arrows# and #a Purple Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Thieves' Hideout#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Saria's Song#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Deku Shield#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find the #Kakariko Potion Shop#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Twinrova# holds...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern GS Spinning Scythe Room

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Huge Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Ice Cavern# corridors ring with #a Compass#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Milk Bottle# can be found in #the Market#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Field# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #2# major items.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Arrows (10 pieces)# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Saria's Song#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Deku Shield# and #the Shadow Temple Boss Key#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: We don't make mistakes, we have happy accidents.
